review: Highly recommended... Doctor Roy was very friendly and also he explained the issues very well.. He suggested what we need to take care of in future as well. I would suggest to visit him once and share your feedback as well..
Doctor was very friendly and cooperative. Took the time to go through things. Really like the experience. Would recommend others.
reply_text: Nice to see you are doing well with medication and advice. Take care

review: Very friendly, well behaved.... experienced....overall just go for him....he also explains the issues very well...gives time

I have booked online video consultation with Dr. Shyama Prasad Roy. The appointment was on time, doctor was good he was listening for all the my concern and after that he had advised for some medicine to take. I am happy with doctor concern so I would like to recommend for others also

He is very good and experience doctor.He listens to the patient.he listens to everythingi like his attitude very much.I want to thank them wholeheartedly because He made me feel comfortable.thans sir.
